full_summary:
# Tender Notification - Contactor Magnetics
## Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01004861
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-220114/A
* **Posting Date**: September 8, 2022
* **Closing Date**: October 11, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of National Defence
## Procurement Overview
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Category**: Goods and Services (G), Defence
## Description of Requirement
The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide two types of contactor magnetics as described below:
* Item 1: General Electric, part number IC5181C105A3XAAA, Quantity: 6, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: General Electric, part number IC5181C105A3XAAA, Quantity: 6, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 3: Ward Leonard CT, part number IC5181C104A3XABX, Quantity: 6, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 4: Ward Leonard CT, part number IC5181C104A3XABX, Quantity: 6, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 5: General Electric, part number IC5181C105A3XABX, Quantity: 6, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 6: General Electric, part number IC5181C105A3XABX, Quantity: 6, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
Supplier must indicate brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE, if proposing an equivalent or substitute product.
* **Price Quote**: Canadian dollars only. Foreign currency bids will be rejected.
## Terms and Conditions
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on procurement details
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
## Contact and Procurement Inquiry
For additional information or clarifications, please contact Ashley Nadeau-Weeks at 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada. Phone number for contact is not available, but can be reached via email
